data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bragagnolo, Cibele, Pinto-Da-Rocha, Ricardo (2012): Systematic review of Promitobates Roewer, 1913 and cladistic analysis of Mitobatinae Simon, 1879 (Arachnida: Opiliones: Gonyleptidae). Zootaxa 3308: 1-48, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.280969
